translation.en: [in Kamtok] Please.
There is enough fish for everyone.
translation.fr: Il y a assez de poissonpour tout le monde.

translation.en: -You have to serve me first. -No, I was here first.
translation.fr: - Tu dois me servir d'abord.- Non, j'étais là avant.

translation.en: Ekah, you need to serve me. I live far off.
translation.fr: Ekah, tu dois me servir.Je vis loin d'ici.

translation.en: Yes, yes, I know who came first and who was last.
translation.fr: Je sais qui est arrivéeen premier et en dernier.

translation.en: OK, let's do this-- whoever stands in line, will get extra fish.
translation.fr: On va faire ça, celles qui feront la queueauront plus de poisson.

translation.en: [woman] Yes.
How much do you need?
Eighteen thousand?
[in Kamtok] Business was good today.
[in English] See, take this one. [in Kamtok] Buy something for yourself.
-Papa! -Take it!
Keep it! You need it more than I do.
translation.fr: Garde-les ! Tu en as plus besoin que moi.

translation.en: Oh! My "little mother."
This business would be nothing without you.
translation.fr: Cette affaire ne serait rien sans toi.

translation.en: [in English] Thank you. [in Kamtok] Thank you.
[in English] We'll go house. We'll go house.
Mommy.
[in Kamtok] Sorry.
[weakly, in English] Water.
Water.
[in Kamtok] Why the stare, Papa?
Because the fish is well roasted.
translation.fr: Parce que le poisson est bien cuit.

translation.en: The fish is very delicious.
[in English] You know why we give you the name, Ekah?
translation.fr: Tu sais pourquoi tu t'appelles Ekah ?

translation.en: Yes, Papa.
Why'd we give you that name?
translation.fr: Pourquoi on t'a donné ce nom ?

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Because it was your mother's name.
When I look at you, all I see is my mother.
translation.fr: Quand je te regarde,c'est ma mère que je vois.

translation.en: You look just like her.
[in English] Even the way you burn this fish, you burn it like my mama.
translation.fr: Même ta façon de griller ce poisson,tu le grilles comme elle.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] If I don't take care of you,
translation.fr: Si je ne veille pas sur toi,

translation.en: who will?
I want you to know, our hard work,
translation.fr: Je veux que tu saches que nos efforts

translation.en: is not in vain.
[in English] People notice.
[in Kamtok] If you ask for the top three fish people in this village...
translation.fr: Si tu demandesles trois meilleurs pêcheurs,

translation.en: [in English] ...they will call my name.
And when they call my name, they will call your name, too.
translation.fr: Ils me nommeront et ils te nommeront.

translation.en: Eh? You do fine work.
[in Kamtok] Keep up the good work.
[Ekah, in English] Yes, Papa.
Papa, if I ask you something...
translation.fr: Je peux te poser une question ?

translation.en: Hmm.
You be like your mommy plenty now?
[in Kamtok] Most definitely.
[in English] I be like my mama plenty.
[in Kamtok] Do you love my mother?
You are too young to understand.
translation.fr: Tu es trop jeune pour comprendre.

translation.en: When you grow up,
you will understand.
[in English] When you grow, we will talk. [in Kamtok] Do you hear me?
translation.fr: On en parlera quand tu seras grande.D'accord ?

translation.en: [in English] Don't worry.
[in Kamtok] Eat!
My "little mother."
Welcome.
[in English] Fine works, mama.
Fine work.
Give me that bucket.
Give me.
[in Kamtok] I don't want to ever leave you.
translation.fr: Je ne veux jamais te quitter.

translation.en: This can never happen to you.
You will not be a slave, in any man's house.
translation.fr: Tu ne seras l'esclave d'aucun homme.

translation.en: The teacher is waiting for her fish. Rush there.
Quickly, don't be late.
translation.fr: Vite, ne sois pas en retard.

translation.en: Teacher.
[in English] I have been calling.
[in Kamtok] I brought your fish.
[in English] This fish is too small.
[in Kamtok] That's how you always buy it. [in English] Are you kidding me? This fish is small.
translation.fr: - Vous l'achetez toujours comme ça.- Tu plaisantes ? Ce poisson est petit.

translation.en: I've been buying from Solomon, he should understand.
translation.fr: Je suis une cliente fidèle.Solomon devrait comprendre.

translation.en: It's too small. Look.
Here.
Careful.
[Solomon, in Kamtok] The teacher wasn't in school?
She was, Papa.
[in English] Then why waste time so?
[in Kamtok] Papa, I saw kids singing school songs. I love it.
translation.fr: J'ai vu des enfantschanter des chansons d'école. Ça m'a plu.

translation.en: How much Kiki's mother owe us?
translation.fr: Combien nous doit la mère de Kiki ?

translation.en: [in English] Six thousand five hundred, Papa.
[in Kamtok] Huh, go and call your Uncle Lucas.
Tell him to come fast... Let's go and collect that debt. OK?
translation.fr: Dis-lui de venir vite.On va récupérer cette dette. Compris ?

translation.en: Don't take too long.
[in English] You hear me?
[woman] I go see Barbara yesterday.
translation.fr: Je suis allée voir Barbara hier.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] She might die very soon.
-Are you serious? -I'm very serious.
Death is calling her name.
She will leave us soon.
Die with all of that education?
You sound like education is important.
Education is useless.
It destroys families.
Only lazy and stupid people go to school.
translation.fr: Seuls les paresseux et les idiotsvont à l'école. C'est une perte de temps et d'argent.

translation.en: Everyone I know in this village, who dared to be educated is poor, ma.
translation.fr: Tous les villageois que je connaisqui ont voulu s'instruire sont pauvres.

translation.en: [in English] Lisa! You sure?
I would lie you?
See, eh, that lazy boy, Peter. [in Kamtok] He still lives with his parents.
translation.fr: Faisons le compte. Peter le paresseuxvit encore chez ses parents.

translation.en: No pocket money.
[in English] Joe too, the same thing.
[in Kamtok] Foolish Barbara decided to join them, too.
translation.fr: Barbara la follea décidé de les rejoindre.

translation.en: Barbara's case is heart-breaking. [in English] A long story.
translation.fr: L'histoire de Barbara est à pleurer.

translation.en: A long story for Barbara.
[in Kamtok] Talk less of Rita...
She went to school to study, and instead got pregnant.
translation.fr: Elle est allée à l'école étudieret est tombée enceinte.

translation.en: [in English] Yes, yes, yes. Rita!
[girl, in Kamtok] Mama, you know I hate school.
translation.fr: Maman, tu sais que je déteste l'école.

translation.en: I prefer to be a fish girl rather than go to school. Or even get married like Aunty Rita.
translation.fr: Je préfère être pêcheuse qu'étudier.Ou même me marier comme Rita.

translation.en: Smart thinking, Andong. You are a smart girl.
translation.fr: Bien raisonné, Andong.Tu es une fille futée.

translation.en: I will buy you garri, so you can eat it with fish.
translation.fr: Je t'achèterai du garipour le manger avec ton poisson.

translation.en: -Mommy? -[groan]
Mommy!
Mommy, Mommy!
Mommy.
Mommy! Papa!
Mommy.
Papa! Mommy.
Mommy, Pa--
[in Kamtok] Solo, how did you find this beautiful place?
translation.fr: Comment as-tu trouvé ce bel endroit ?

translation.en: [in English] I'm a fisherman! I'm a fisherman!
[in Kamtok] It was here... [in English] ...when my papa ask my mama, if they can marry.
translation.fr: C'est là que mon pèrea fait sa demande à ma mère.

translation.en: You like, huh?
[in Kamtok] Yes, it is very beautiful.
[in English] So...
what will we do today?
Barbara, I like you.
And the way I like you,
only in calculator it will show up.
translation.fr: seule une calculette peut le compter.

translation.en: The way I like you...
[in Kamtok] ...even a calculator cannot show it.
translation.fr: même une calculettene peut pas le compter.

translation.en: [in English] See...
[in Kamtok] You know, I cannot make a good family, if I don't have a good wife.
translation.fr: je ne peux pas fonder de bonne famillesans une femme bonne.

translation.en: [in English] You are the woman who done touched my heart.
translation.fr: Tu es la seule femme que j'aime vraiment.

translation.en: Any time I look inside your eyes,
translation.fr: Chaque fois que je plonge dans tes yeux,

translation.en: my body just makes some kind...
I like you, Barbara.
I want you to be my woman.
translation.fr: Je veux que tu sois ma femme.

translation.en: Be my woman, we could make some fine family, me and you.
translation.fr: Sois ma femme,on pourrait former une belle famille.

translation.en: That I dream about, you know, ever since...
translation.fr: Ça a toujours été mon rêve.

translation.en: Make me your woman, Solo.
I will be your woman.
-[in Kamtok] Is that a yes? -[in English] Yes!
[in Kamtok] You see why I say you melt my heart?
translation.fr: Tu vois pourquoi je disque tu fais fondre mon cœur ?

translation.en: Thank you for the beautiful shoes. I like them a lot.
translation.fr: Merci pour les jolies chaussures.Elles me plaisent beaucoup.

translation.en: [in English] Ah! I could do everything for my Barbara.
translation.fr: Tout ce que tu veux, mon amour.

translation.en: Teacher.
What are you doing here?
What's that?
Let me see.
[Ekah, in Kamtok] What is she saying?
[in English] "One child,
one teacher,
one book,
and one pen, can change the world."
translation.fr: et un stylo peuvent changer le monde."

translation.en: "If one man can destroy the world,
translation.fr: "Si un homme peut détruire le monde,

translation.en: why can't one girl...
translation.fr: pourquoi une fille ne peut pas...

translation.en: ...change it?"
[in Kamtok] Wh-- What is her name? [in English] She is called Malala.
[in Kamtok] What will you do?
This is what killed your mother.
translation.fr: C'est ça qui a tué ta mère.

translation.en: Have you eaten?
Help take off my shoes.
I have saved some money.
I will buy you a new fish barn next month. OK?
translation.fr: Je t'achèterai un nouveau grille mois prochain.

translation.en: So you can roast fish very well.
translation.fr: Pour que tu puissesbien griller le poisson.

translation.en: Your father go, see a friend.
translation.fr: Ton père est allé voir son ami.

translation.en: Ekah. -[in Kamtok] Yes, uncle. -You are a very good child.
translation.fr: - Ekah. Tu es une enfant super.- Oui, tonton.

translation.en: Everyone is proud of you.
translation.fr: Tout le monde est fier de toi.

translation.en: [in English] Thank-- Thank you, uncle.
If one of my three boy, them, they cook like you so,
translation.fr: Si un de mes garçonstravaillait aussi dur que toi,

translation.en: I would have been a happy man.
[in Kamtok] Your father is very respected here,
translation.fr: Ton père est très respecté ici

translation.en: because of you.
[in English] No change, eh. [in Kamtok] You should never change.
Let me rush to work.
Have you ever asked yourself why all these educated kids are poor?
translation.fr: Tu t'es déjà demandé pourquoi tous ces enfants instruitssont pauvres ?

translation.en: They are lazy kids.
You understand? They are very lazy kids.
translation.fr: Tu comprends ?Ce sont des enfants paresseux.

translation.en: Education is not for women.
translation.fr: L'éducation n'est pas bonnepour les femmes.

translation.en: All right. Think about this.
Has an educated person ever bought fish from you,
translation.fr: Quelqu'un d'instruitt'a déjà acheté du poisson

translation.en: without arguing the price?
They are poor. We even feed them.
translation.fr: Ils sont pauvres. On les nourrit même.

translation.en: Yes, we do.
Stay just the way you are. We like you as you are.
translation.fr: Reste comme tu es. On t'aime comme ça.

translation.en: [in English] Not change.
[in Kamtok] Let nobody deceive you with education. Education is bad for women.
translation.fr: Ne te laisse pas avoir avec l'éducation.C'est mauvais pour les femmes.

translation.en: You understand?
Let me rush to work.
-[both in Kamtok] How are you? -I'm all right.
My uncle came back yesterday.
translation.fr: Mon oncle est revenu de la ville hier.

translation.en: He says I will start school on Monday.
translation.fr: Il a dit que je commençais l'école lundi.

translation.en: I don't want to go to school. Please, give me an excuse to tell him.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas y aller. S'il te plaît,trouve-moi une excuse à lui dire.

translation.en: I hate school.
Sorry, I have to go. We'll talk some other time.
translation.fr: Désolée, je dois y aller.On en parlera une autre fois.

translation.en: [in English] Why you wake up late, so?
[in Kamtok] You had too much work yesterday?
I slept late.
I have repaired the engine. The new kick-starter is working fine.
translation.fr: J'ai réparé le moteur.Le nouveau démarreur fonctionne bien.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Hah, are you OK?
-What did you say? -Where is your father?
Where is your father?
[woman in Kamtok] Please serve my fish, I have to go.
translation.fr: Donne-moi mon poisson. Je dois y aller.

translation.en: Madam, I beg you. If you can't wait, then you go to a different place.
translation.fr: Si vous ne pouvez pas attendre. Allez-y.

translation.en: What did you say?
[in English] I said, if you no feel wait, then you go different place.
translation.fr: J'ai dit, si vous ne pouvez pas attendre,allez l'acheter ailleurs.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] I'm leaving. [in English] Give my money.
[Ekah] Which money?
[in Kamtok] Didn't I pay you? [in English] Give my balance.
translation.fr: Je ne t'ai pas payée ?Rends-moi la monnaie.

translation.en: Madam, I beg no just start.
[in Kamtok] You never give me nothing, and you can't trick me. Never!
translation.fr: Vous ne m'avez rien donné.Vous ne me la ferez pas.

translation.en: -Eh? -[Solomon] Ekah!
-Madam, please don't be mad. -If not for you, I would have left.
translation.fr: - Madame, ne vous fâchez pas.- Sans vous, je partais.

translation.en: -I'll serve you-- she forgot. -It is only because of you.
translation.fr: - Je vous sers. Elle a oublié.- Ça va, parce que c'est vous.

translation.en: Don't be angry, please understand. I have heard you.
translation.fr: - Ne vous fâchez pas.- J'ai entendu.

translation.en: [in English] She buy fish for 3,000.
translation.fr: Elle a acheté pour 3 000 de poisson.

translation.en: She give 5,000. Give balance.
[in Kamtok] So, she even has the change.
Please don't be angry. Please understand.
Have you been served?
Serve me!
[in Kamtok] Welcome.
Mustapha. How are you?
What is it?
[in English] Give me my money.
[in Kamtok] This is a joke, right? [in English] You know time?
translation.fr: C'est une blague ?Tu as vu l'heure ?

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Lucas, I didn't come here to joke with you.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas venu pour rigoler.

translation.en: You can't ask for a debt, at this time.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pasréclamer une dette à chaque fois.

translation.en: I gave you the money in these times.
translation.fr: Je t'ai donné l'argent en même temps.

translation.en: [in English] Anyway...
[in Kamtok] Based on calculations, I can only pay you next month.
translation.fr: Selon mes calculs,je ne peux payer que le mois prochain.

translation.en: I don't have the money now.
translation.fr: Je ne l'ai pas pour l'instant.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Lucas, enough of your stupid jokes.
Do you see me laughing?
I am not joking. I don't have money. Next month.
translation.fr: Je suis sérieux. Je n'ai pas l'argent.Le mois prochain.

translation.en: Lucas, you are a liar. [in English] Lucas, you lie.
[in Kamtok] Don't we see you selling coconut water by the sea every day?
translation.fr: On ne te voit pas vendre sur la plagetous les jours ?

translation.en: How can he talk this?
[in English] Who give you the power to come to my compound, and curse me? I do owe you?
translation.fr: Tu oses venir chez moi m'insulter ?Je te dois de l'argent ?

translation.en: I do owe you? [in Kamtok] Lucas, Mustapha is telling the truth.
You cannot dribble me like Samuel Eto'o, on a football pitch.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas me dribblercomme Samuel Eto'o sur un terrain de foot.

translation.en: Lucas, if you don't pay my money...
translation.fr: Si tu ne me paies pas...

translation.en: you will be dead.
[in English] You come my house, you can't threaten me.
translation.fr: Tu me menaces dans ma maison ?

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Sule. Look...
[in English] I go cover my eye... I'll count from one to five.
translation.fr: Je vais fermer les yeuxet compter jusqu'à cinq.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] When I open my eyes, and you're still here, I promise you...
translation.fr: Si tu es encore là quand je les ouvre,je te le promets...

translation.en: one of you will be dead.
[in English] One.
Two.
Three.
Four.
Five.
No. Sule?
Eh, what is this? [in Kamtok] You don't know how to joke?
translation.fr: Ça veut dire quoi ? Tu ne sais pas rire ?

translation.en: [in English] Eh, my brother. [in Kamtok] Let's fix this like men...
translation.fr: Tu es mon frère.Réglons ça comme des hommes.

translation.en: Let's fix it like brothers.
[in English] W-Why?
[in Kamtok] My brother, you will be dead if you don't pay my money.
translation.fr: Mon frère, tu es mortsi je n'ai pas mon argent.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] The money is in my pocket.
[in English] My pocket.
[in Kamtok] Let's fix this like brothers.
[in English] How much?
Four thousand?
[in Kamtok] You owe me 70,000.
[in English] Sule, that's all I have. I tell you... you give me some time, no?
translation.fr: C'est tout ce que j'ai.Laisse-moi un peu de temps.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] That's all I have right now. Lucas, you must finish paying me my money.
translation.fr: - C'est tout ce que j'ai pour l'instant.- Tu dois finir de me payer.

translation.en: [in English] OK. You go take firewood?
[in English] What?
You're not gonna need to buy firewood again for two year.
translation.fr: Tu n'aurais plus besoin d'en acheter.

translation.en: I swear.
[in Kamtok] Here is the wood.
[in Kamtok] Drink it while it's still hot.
It will cure your cough. Drink it.
[in English] Drink.
Something that worry you?
[in Kamtok] Is something disturbing you? You look worried.
translation.fr: Quelque chose te tracasse ?Tu as l'air inquiète.

translation.en: The misunderstanding with that woman should not disturb you.
translation.fr: L'histoire avec cette femmene doit pas te tracasser.

translation.en: OK?
You were too busy.
So you got confused.
It can happen to anyone.
translation.fr: Ça arrive à tout le monde.

translation.en: Do you understand? Don't worry, drink up.
translation.fr: Tu comprends ? Ne t'en fais pas, bois.

translation.en: Drink it before it gets cold [in English] Drink.
translation.fr: Bois tant que c'est chaud. Bois.

translation.en: I want to go to school.
School is not for fish people like we.
translation.fr: L'école n'est paspour les pêcheurs comme nous.

translation.en: And you being a woman.
[in Kamtok] That is a bad idea.
What will the villagers say?
What will those same people say...
when I go to school and start making money?
translation.fr: si je vais à l'écoleet que je me mets à gagner de l'argent ?

translation.en: I mean, a lot of money.
Nobody in this house would need to go fishing, every day, 24/7.
translation.fr: Personne dans cette maisonn'aurait besoin de pêcher jour et nuit.

translation.en: Our lives would be changed forever.
They say, a blind person cannot lead another.
translation.fr: On dit qu'un aveugle ne peut guider.

translation.en: Fishing is for young people.
translation.fr: La pêche, c'est pour les jeunes.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] What would happen when we got old and couldn't go fishing?
translation.fr: Il se passera quoi quand on sera vieuxet qu'on ne pourra plus pêcher ?

translation.en: God has blessed us with just one kid.
translation.fr: Dieu nous a bénis d'un seul enfant.

translation.en: And it's a girl.
What God has blessed us with, is fishing.
translation.fr: La bénédiction que Dieu nous a donnée,c'est la pêche.

translation.en: And we can't change it.
I disagree with you.
[Solomon] My "little mother."
[in English] You say you want to go to school...
translation.fr: Tu dis que tu veux aller à l'école.

translation.en: You asked me the other time, if I like your mama.
translation.fr: Tu m'as demandé l'autre fois si j'aimais ta maman.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Do you want to know the answer now?
Do you?
[in English] I never ever liked my skin.
translation.fr: Je ne me suis jamais aimé.

translation.en: [in Kamtok] Every love and care I had...
translation.fr: Tout l'amour et l'attention que j'avais...

translation.en: I gave it to your mother.
translation.fr: je l'ai donné à ta mère.

translation.en: When my mother and brother Lucas
translation.fr: Quand ma mère et mon frère Lucas

translation.en: tried to say anything bad about her,
translation.fr: ont voulu dire du mal d'elle,

translation.en: I kicked my mother out of the house.
Nobody loves your mother more than me.
translation.fr: Personne n'aime plus ta mère que moi.

translation.en: I mean, nobody.
Not even God.
And not even you.
You don't love her more than I do.
translation.fr: Tu ne l'aimes pas plus que moi.

translation.en: It seems the devil took over her.
translation.fr: C'est comme si le diables'était emparé d'elle.

translation.en: She started talking to me like a mad woman.
translation.fr: Elle a commencéà me parler comme une folle.

translation.en: [in English] My fiancé...
has accepted to pay every dime you spent on me,
translation.fr: a accepté de payer chaque centimeque tu as dépensé pour moi,

translation.en: including interest.
-I will pay you back. -No, no, no. [in Kamtok] No, you can't utter such words.
translation.fr: - Je te rembourserai.- Tu ne peux pas dire ça.

translation.en: I refuse to accept this.
[in English] You are my woman!
Try to understand, papa.
I beg. [in Kamtok] Let me go.
Is this what education does?
-That man doesn't love you... -Please, hold it!
translation.fr: - Cet homme ne t'aime pas.- Pitié, arrête !

translation.en: [in English] Do I look like a kid? Oh, you want to teach me about love?
translation.fr: J'ai l'air d'une enfant ?Tu vas m'apprendre ce qu'est l'amour ?

translation.en: This whole place is a mental prison.
translation.fr: Cet endroit est une prison mentale.

translation.en: I wouldn't want her to suffocate in this madness.
translation.fr: Je refusequ'elle étouffe dans cette folie.

translation.en: I will die first...
[in Kamtok] ...than let you make the same mistakes as your mother.
translation.fr: plutôt que de te laisserfaire les mêmes erreurs.

translation.en: [in English] No happen.
[in Kamtok] You hear me? You hear me?!
translation.fr: Ça n'arrivera pas. Tu m'entends ? Tu m'entends ?

translation.en: [in English] No happen again.
Not going to happen.
[in Kamtok] I'm sorry.
-[in English] Thank you. -[in Kamtok] I'm sorry, too.
Where is your mother?
She went out.
Didn't you say you do not want to go to school?
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas ditne pas vouloir aller à l'école ?

translation.en: My uncle came yesterday,
and made a big deal out of it.
translation.fr: Il en a fait toute une histoire.

translation.en: About what?
When my father died in the fishing waters,
translation.fr: Quand mon père est mortdans les eaux de pêche,

translation.en: my uncle promised to send me to school.
translation.fr: mon oncle a promis de m'envoyer à l'école.

translation.en: He has been sending money for school fees, but my mom has been spending it.
translation.fr: Il envoie des sous pour payer l'école,mais ma mère les dépense.

translation.en: Yesterday, after the fight, he bought me two uniforms,
translation.fr: Hier, après la dispute,il m'a acheté deux uniformes

translation.en: then this morning he went and paid my school fees.
translation.fr: et ce matin,il a payé mes frais de scolarité.

translation.en: How was it?
What?
[in English] School.
[in Kamtok] It was boring.
I had no idea what the teacher was saying.
translation.fr: Je ne comprends rienà ce que dit la prof.

translation.en: [in English] One divided by two.
[in Kamtok] I was in class but thinking about us.
translation.fr: J'étais en classe, mais je pensais à nous.

translation.en: How we were free and enjoying being by the seaside.
translation.fr: Comme on était libres,à profiter de la mer.

translation.en: [teacher, in English] What are the factors of six?
translation.fr: Quels sont les facteurs de six ?

translation.en: What are the factors of six?
translation.fr: Quels sont les facteurs de six ?

translation.en: Who knows the answer?
Anybody?
-Say One. -[pupils] One.
